verbs.description: Longtime Donald Trump lawyer Michael Cohen [V: has] hired a new defense lawyer who once ran criminal prosecutions in the New York district where he is being investigated .
[ARG0: Longtime Donald Trump lawyer Michael Cohen] has [V: hired] [ARG1: a new defense lawyer who once ran criminal prosecutions in the New York district where he is being investigated] .

Longtime Donald Trump lawyer Michael Cohen has hired [ARG0: a new defense lawyer] [R-ARG0: who] [ARGM-TMP: once] [V: ran] [ARG1: criminal prosecutions] [ARGM-LOC: in the New York district where he is being investigated] .
Longtime Donald Trump lawyer Michael Cohen has hired a new defense lawyer who once ran criminal prosecutions in the New York district where he [V: is] being investigated .
Longtime Donald Trump lawyer Michael Cohen has hired a new defense lawyer who once ran criminal prosecutions in the New York district where he is [V: being] investigated .

Longtime Donald Trump lawyer Michael Cohen has hired a new defense lawyer who once ran criminal prosecutions in [ARGM-LOC: the New York district] [R-ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG1: he] is being [V: investigated] .
